message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  I'm happy to start the conversation at $2,300,000.  I believe in the value this brings, and this is a fair starting point for a product of this caliber.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in the product. I appreciate the value it offers, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $800,000. I would like to propose an offer of $1,200,000.

Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your budget constraints but $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider coming down to $2,100,000. This offer reflects the value this product brings.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given the value I place on the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $1,600,000.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me. To be frank, $1,600,000 is cutting it very close to my bottom line.  I can come down to $1,950,000, but this is my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice. I value the product highly, but I must stick to my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1,750,000.
